title: #1491 When Smart People Act Stupid, They Lie
itunes:title: #1491 When Smart People Act Stupid, They Lie
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show with Drew telling Adam about the woes of his recent travels including a flight turned around as well his Halloween experience in New Orleans.  He also describes some unruly airport behavior leading Adam to ask a larger question about behavior that people are willing to engage in today as opposed to historically. They then turn to the phones as a nurse practitioner calls in to discuss with Drew how medical professionals are trained today. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:

Subscribe to The Jordan Harbinger Show
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
BlockTraffik.org
